info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 3:54PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Higher amounts of around 12 inches are possible in the eastern Catskills. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and mid Hudson Valley and eastern Catskills. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may be close to one inch per hour at times for Saturday evening into early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
